name: A Quiet Little Town
description:
A short horror game about helping out a small town.

WARNING: This game contains Flashing Images

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
E - Interact

Credits:
- Aaron "Bacon" Brownlee - Programming, Design
- Aidan "Knowhere" Hendry - Music, Design

- Art assets were colourised from here: 
https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack
 with a few extra sprites and animations made by me (Aaron).

Made for the Scream Jam 2021 over the course of a few days
